loader.name: WEBAPP BUILDER
loader.compatibilityFirst:
return !!(window.document.querySelector &&
	window.console &&window.document.addEventListener &&
	(window.document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).classList &&
	window.localStorage &&
	window.navigator &&
	window.XMLHttpRequest &&
	window.applicationCache &&
	window.document.createEvent &&
	arr.map &&
	arr.every);
loader.viewport: user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, minimum-scale=1, width=device-width, height=device-height

text.incompatibleByFeatures: Browser incompatible (there are not features), for your secutiry we recommend update it, check this page: http://browsehappy.com
text.incompatibleByDiag: Browser incompatible, for your secutiry we recommend update it, or use another one, check this page: http://browsehappy.com
text.semiIncompatible: Browser not recognice, the app can works but it can have issues, we recomend update or use another one, check this page: http://browsehappy.com
